runs.comm: Utseya starts off down the leg side from round the wicket, wide called
tossed up on middle and leg and clipped to the on side
gives it a lot of air and he gets a top edge on the sweep, landed safely though at fine leg
stays on the back foot and punches it back to the bowler

well opening with Utseya seems to have worked after all! Tossed up on off and he goes for the slog sweep - the shot that cost Bangladesh two crucial wickets yesterday - deep midwicket was in place for that shot, comfortably taken
plays it back to the bowler
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
he too starts off with a wide down the leg side
this one nips away from the left-hander, he pushes it to the off side
fullish in length outside the off stump and he drives towards cover
this one nipped back in and sliced him in half, hits his pad and lobs towards the keeper
Shakib gives the charge and makes room and swishes at thin air
he makes room and gives the charge and connects this time, finds the gap at deep midwicket
he makes room and goes for the pull but doesn't time it well enough, lands at deep midwicket
third consecutive over begins with an extra, he oversteps, gives him width and bowls full, he smashes it over cover
fails to put away the Free Hit, it was full and wide and thrashed straight to mid-off
Shingi's struggling with his length here, overpitched outside the off stump and he smashes it off the front foot wide of backward point
he comes round the wicket this time, lands it on a good length, Shakib has the time to stay back and pull in front of square
fullish in length outside off and he opens the face and steers it wide of point
best shot of the over so far, this was a half volley outside off and Tamim bends his knee and plays a classical cover drive
Was that a drop? Taylor's lets it go, poor shot by Tamim, slashing outside off on the front foot, Taylor grabbed at it and his reaction suggested that he may have edged it
Shakib has another free swing, this was drifting towards the body, he swivels and pulls over square leg
nips back in and he swings and the ball deflects off his body to the off side
lovely delivery! Coming in through the air and moves away after pitching, squared him up completely, nearly gloved it
this time he bangs in the bouncer and he swivels and pulls and clears short fine leg
squares him up a bit at the crease and the ball rolls to the off side
this is an electric start, round the wicket and wide outside off, he reaches out and bashes it past cover and mid-off, Panyangara's struggling
drifts back in and he swings again and the ball goes to deep midwicket
they want to smash everything, he was down the track and he swished at thin air, nowhere near the ball
another swing, this was pitched up and swinging away and he went for the slash and got an outside edge that beat the keeper, no slip
not that risky this time, this was a half volley outside off  and he plays a neat square drive past the diving backward point fielder
full again and driven towards extra cover, the fielder dives and cuts it off
stays back and works it to the on side
bowls that towards leg and he chips down the track and chips it to long-on
plays the paddle sweep
goes for the heave and mistimes it to long-on
flatter delivery and he goes for the slog and the ball rolls to the off side
chips down the track and forces it to long-on
drops it a fraction short and he stays back and pulls this hard to deep midwicket
softly places it to the on side
gives it more air and he comes forward and clips it to midwicket
this was smashed back really hard down the track and well fielded by the bowler
gives him width and he slashes it straight to short third man
goes for the slog and he misses, the ball rolls to the off side
they continue to attack Shingi! Round the wicket, pitched up, Tamim was down the track to thrash it wide of mid-off
this time it's a full toss and he places it to long-off

Dropped but a great attempt by Sibanda! This was pitched up and Shakib was down the track and carved that towards deep extra cover, Sibanda jumped and tried to catch that one-handed, palmed it over the rope
on theleg stump, on the pad to short fine leg, overthrow gives them the leg bye
places it straight to short third man
gets beside the line and places it to deep point
drifts down the leg side and wide called
gets on his knee and sweeps him hard to deep square leg
this was well placed, he makes room and gives the legspinner the charge, slogs him over midwicket, bisects the gap between two fielders
over the second tier! Tossed up and Tamim comes down the track and goes downtown over long-on, that really travelled, biggest six we've seen in the last two days
fullish in length on the pads and clipped to the on side
attacking knock comes to an end! Shakib tries to swing that over deep square leg, flighted delivery, Raza takes it comfortably in the deep
Mushfiqur gets a sighter, dropped short and he swivels and pulls past deep midwicket who dives in vain
plays the reverse sweep this time and he places it past short third man
stays back and punches it on the up down to long-on
nearly chipped it back to thew bowler, the ball stopped on him
stays back and clips it to the on side
Mushfiqur's looking dangerous, this was dropped short and once again he picked the length early, swiveled and pulled him down to deep midwicket
comes forward and he drives to sweeper cover
stays back and punches it to the off side
good delivery, saw the batsman advance and bowled it on middle and leg, cramped him for room, played it back to the bowler
Both well-set batsmen are back in the pavilion now! Tamim continued to give Utseya the charge, didn't get the distance and Shing takes it at long-on
stays back and punches it towards the on side
plays it down to deep extra cover
gets the top edge on the sweep and luckily for the batsman the ball just cleared Vitori at short fine leg
drifts towards the pads and he defends
stays back and punches it towards extra cover
flatter delivery and worked towards midwicket
stays back, waits for the turn and tucks it towards square leg
stays back and he places it to the off side
comes forward and gently works it towards mid-on

the umpire was quick to give that out but was it hitting? Mushfiqur shaped to slog a length ball over the on side, the ball hits his thigh, you could see off and middle stump, could only have hit leg stump
fulish in length and he pushes it to the off side
drifts towards the leg side and he works it to the on side
drifts down the leg side and wide called
full outside off and he place sit wide of point
stays back and he punches it towards the off side
tries to sweep and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
well bowled, he saw the batsman charge and dropped it short, he played it  back to the bowler
drops it short and he plays it straight to short fine leg
soft dismissal for Mahmudullah, Panyangara pitched it up outside off, he went for the spooned drive and played it straight to Raza at extra over
comes forward and drives straight to cover
drops it short and he pulls to deep square leg
poor delivery and spanked away, this was short and wide outside off, he hops at the crease and carves it over point
outside edge but intelligently played, there was no slip, pitched up outside off and he controls the shot past the keeper
low full toss and he pushed it towards midwicket
stays back and he punches it back to the bowler
tossed up and he comes forward and lofts it over extra cover, flurry of boundaries by Nasir
drops it short and he pulls to deep midwicket
stays back and punches it towards mid-on
the bowler bowls it too wide of the crease and he's penalised for cutting the line, good spot by the umpire
fails to put away the Free Hit, stays back and punches it towards cover
this is a low full toss and he knocks it towards midwicket and they set off for a quick single
tries to slog that one and he gets an inside edge to the leg side
the lap shot doesn't quite come off, moves right across his stumps and the ball spoons off the face of the bat to his body, they can only get a single
goes for a wild swing outside off a misses
low full toss on the pads and he whips it away to deep square leg
it's a front foot no ball, pitched up outside off and he comes down the track and carves it over extra cover
another Free Hit's not put away, this was fired full and wide outside off and he fails to get bat on it
good start to the over, yorker outside and he fails to dig it out
sprays that far too wide outside off, cutting the line
bowls the yorker and he makes room and squeezes it out to long-on
stays back at the crease and he slaps him down to deep point
moves right across the stumps for the lap shot we presume, once again the ball clips the pads and rolls away
gives far too much room, he backs away to smash that and Vitori fires in a yorker at leg stump, hits the base of the stump, the stump is upright, the bails fly
appeal for a run out! Lands outside off, he pushes it to mid-on, they set off, Nasir is sent back, Sibanda gathers and hits the stumps and Nasir dives and he's short
makes room and he gives the charge and he swings and misses
comes down the track and he drills it down to long-on
good yorker outside off, Razzak fails to dig it out, much like yesterday evening
fires another full delivery but this is far too wide outside off
overpitched and he makes room and carves it over backward point
for a change the scoop comes off okay, fuller delivery and he shuffles across and scoops it over the keeper
Razzak shuffles across and clips it to the on side and there's a stifled appeal for an lbw
makes room and crashes it wide of long-off
good yorker outside off, he tries to squeeze it out but misses
tries the reverse sweep and Vitori doesn't allow him by bowling it full and on the pads, gets some bat on it and they take a single
full on the leg stump and whipped past midwicket
another yorker and he works it in front of long-on, they take a couple and coincidentally  Bangladesh post the same score as Zimbabwe did yesterday
